1547570.name: RPG Maker MZ - Krachware User Interface Material POPFANTASY
1547570.description:
The new Krachware User Interface Pop Fantasy pack from Gee Kun Soft offers creators hundreds of options when it comes to freshening out their next game’s UI. With a multitude of options for makers to fancy up their display, they will get to select from designs in a color palette that includes a blue, red, grey, and black color.

The Krachware User Interface Material Pop Fantasy pack provides the necessary tools including various options from buttons for controls, now loading screens for transitions, and game over screens for when things didn’t go so well. But let’s restart! This pack also contains nearly 100 borders to jazz up a display with both widescreen and fullscreen sizes for those who want something more current or are going for a total retro kick. Although, perhaps your game will use both widescreen and fullscreen borders to tell a present day story that also references the past. How will this pack serve your story?

Features:

* titles2 folder: 96 frames for openings and more! (8 designs with color variants in 1280x720/816x624 sizes)
* system folder: 108 windowskins (9 designs with color variants), 6 x "Game Over", 4 x "Now Loading"
* bonus folder: 108 buttons (36 designs x 3 sizes), plus 3 frames in1280x720/816x624 sizes!

**Please note that you need the editing software to work with some of the material in "bonus" folder for RPG Makers**

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1547570.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
